protein.specific_function: Troponin I is the inhibitory subunit of troponin, the thin filament regulatory complex which confers calcium-sensitivity to striated muscle actomyosin ATPase activity

reference.reference_text: Zhu L, Perez-Alvarado G, Wade R: Sequencing of a cDNA encoding the human fast-twitch skeletal muscle isoform of troponin I. Biochim Biophys Acta. 1994 Apr 6;1217(3):338-40.
Mullen AJ, Barton PJ: Structural characterization of the human fast skeletal muscle troponin I gene (TNNI2). Gene. 2000 Jan 25;242(1-2):313-20.
